entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
